languages.text: {n}Властный металл звенит в голосе Нихель.{/n} "Технобрат, я предлагаю тебе смиренно принять судьбу, которая угодна Омниссии. Не сопротивляйся ликвидации, и уйдешь в забвение, как мой друг и единоверец".

{n}Nihel's voice is imperiously metallic:{/n} "Tech-brother, I offer you the chance to yield peacefully to a fate that will please the Omnissiah. Do not resist your termination, and you will pass into oblivion as my friend and fellow believer."
languages.original_text: {n}Властный металл звенит в голосе Нихель.{/n} "Технобрат, я предлагаю тебе смиренно принять судьбу, которая угодна Омниссии. Не сопротивляйся ликвидации, и уйдешь в забвение, как мой друг и единоверец".

traits.locale_text: {n}Nihel's voice is imperiously metallic.{/n} "Tech-brother, I offer you to yield peacefully to a fate that will please the Omnissiah. Do not resist your termination, and you will pass into oblivion as my friend and fellow believer."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

traits.locale_text: {n}Nihel's voice is imperiously metallic.{/n} "Tech-brother, I offer you to yield peacefully to a fate that will please the Omnissiah. Do not resist your termination, and you will pass into oblivion as my friend and fellow believer."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nihel's voice is imperiously metallic:{/n} "Tech-brother, I offer you the chance to yield peacefully to a fate that will please the Omnissiah. Do not resist your termination, and you will pass into oblivion as my friend and fellow believer."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: {n}ニヘルの声は傲慢かつ無機質だ。{/n}「同胞よ、おとなしく運命に屈するチャンスを与えよう。万機神もお気に召すだろう。抵抗することなく動作を停止せよ。さすれば我が友人にして同志のお前は忘れ去られる」
languages.original_text: {n}Nihel's voice is imperiously metallic:{/n} "Tech-brother, I offer you the chance to yield peacefully to a fate that will please the Omnissiah. Do not resist your termination, and you will pass into oblivion as my friend and fellow believer."

traits.locale_text: {n}ニヘルの声は傲慢かつ無機質だ。{/n}「同胞よ、おとなしく運命に屈するチャンスを与えよう。万機神もお気に召すだろう。抵抗することなく動作を停止せよ。さすれば我が友人にして同志のお前は忘れ去られる」
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: {n}妮赫尔金属般的声音透着不容置疑的专横。{/n}“技术兄弟，我允许你平静地接受这取悦欧姆尼塞亚的命运。不要拒绝你的终止，你将作为我的朋友与伙伴，步入湮灭之中。”
languages.original_text: {n}Nihel's voice is imperiously metallic:{/n} "Tech-brother, I offer you the chance to yield peacefully to a fate that will please the Omnissiah. Do not resist your termination, and you will pass into oblivion as my friend and fellow believer."

traits.locale_text: {n}雅珀金属般的声音透着不容置疑的专横。{/n}“技术伙伴，我建议你，平静地接受这取悦欧姆尼塞亚的命运。不要拒绝你的终止，你将作为我的朋友与信徒同胞，步入湮灭之中。”
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: « Technoconfrère, {n}poursuit-elle d'une voix impérieusement métallique.{/n} Je vous offre la chance de vous soumettre à un destin qui saura satisfaire l'Omnimessie. Ne résistez pas à l'anéantissement, et vous rejoindrez le néant en tant que mon ami, fidèle à la cause. »
languages.original_text: {n}Nihel's voice is imperiously metallic:{/n} "Tech-brother, I offer you the chance to yield peacefully to a fate that will please the Omnissiah. Do not resist your termination, and you will pass into oblivion as my friend and fellow believer."

traits.locale_text: « Technoconfrère, {n}poursuit-elle d'une voix impérieusement métallique.{/n} Je vous demande de vous soumettre à un destin qui saura satisfaire l'Omnimessie. Ne résistez pas à l'anéantissement, et vous rejoindrez le néant en tant que mon ami, fidèle à la cause. »
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: {n}La voz de Nihel suena imperiosamente metálica.{/n} «Tecnohermano, te ofrezco la oportunidad de afrontar pacíficamente un destino que será del agrado del Omnissiah. No resistas a tu exterminio, y pasarás al olvido como mi amigo y mi compañero creyente».
languages.original_text: {n}Nihel's voice is imperiously metallic:{/n} "Tech-brother, I offer you the chance to yield peacefully to a fate that will please the Omnissiah. Do not resist your termination, and you will pass into oblivion as my friend and fellow believer."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz de Nihel suena imperiosamente metálica.{/n} «Tecnocamarada, te ofrezco afrontar pacíficamente un destino que será del agrado del Omnissiah. No resistas a tu exterminio, y pasarás al olvido como mi amigo y mi compañero creyente».
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: {n}Nihels Stimme ist gebieterisch metallisch:{/n} "Tech-Bruder, ich biete Euch die Gelegenheit, Euch friedlich einem Schicksal zu ergeben, das dem Omnissiah gefällt. Widersetzt Euch Eurer Terminierung nicht, dann werdet ihr als mein Freund und Mitgläubiger ins Vergessen gehen."
languages.original_text: {n}Nihel's voice is imperiously metallic:{/n} "Tech-brother, I offer you the chance to yield peacefully to a fate that will please the Omnissiah. Do not resist your termination, and you will pass into oblivion as my friend and fellow believer."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nihels Stimme ist gebieterisch metallisch.{/n} "Techkamerad, ich bitte Euch an, Euch friedlich einem Schicksal zu ergeben, das dem Omnissiah gefällt. Widersetzt Euch Eurer Terminierung nicht, dann werdet ihr als mein Freund und Mitgläubiger ins Vergessen gehen."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: {n}Nihel'in sesi, net bir metalik tonla çıkıyor.{/n} "Tekno kardeşim, sana Hermesih'i memnun edecek bir kadere teslim olma şansı sunuyorum. İmha işlemine direnme, arkadaşım ve din kardeşim olarak sonsuzluğa göç."
languages.original_text: {n}Nihel's voice is imperiously metallic:{/n} "Tech-brother, I offer you the chance to yield peacefully to a fate that will please the Omnissiah. Do not resist your termination, and you will pass into oblivion as my friend and fellow believer."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nihel'in sesi metalik ve çok net:{/n} "Tekno kardeşim, sana kendini, Hermesih'i memnun edecek bir kadere huzur içinde teslim etme şansı sunuyorum. Yok edilme işlemine direnme, böylece sonsuzluğa arkadaşım ve din kardeşim olarak göçebilirsin."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper
